ORIGAM Documentation : UpdateList Method

Created by Rita Vavrdová, last modified by Tomáš Vavrda on Oct 02, 2014

This method stores data into the SharePoint list.

This method does not return any values and should have OutputType set to Ignore.

Parameters

ParameterTypeDescription
DataContext Store ReferenceData to be stored in the SharePoint list. Only data in the entity of which name is the same as ListName will be sent to SharePoint.
ListNameString (Context Store Reference, Data Constant Reference)Name of the SharePoint list.
ViewNameString (Context Store Reference , Data Constant Reference)Name of the view. If omitted, default view is taken.
